executive_summary.market_state: Consolidation after severe breakdown - Testing critical support zone
executive_summary.current_position: At lower boundary of post-breakdown consolidation range
executive_summary.primary_bias: Neutral to slightly bearish - Decision point at support
executive_summary.primary_recommendation: Wait for directional confirmation. Price consolidating in $400-412 range after capitulation. Break below $400 targets $380-390. Reclaim of $410-412 opens path to $420 resistance test.
executive_summary.key_insight: TSLA has stabilized after previous -12% breakdown, now forming potential base at $400-410. Volume declining suggests exhaustion. This is a coiling pattern - breakout imminent in either direction within 24-48 hours.

scenarios.reasoning: Price at critical $400 support after severe breakdown. Volume declining but support not yet confirmed as holding. Break below $400 would complete bearish pattern targeting $380-390 zone predicted in prior analysis.
supporting_factors: Still in downtrend structure - lower highs intact
All major MAs overhead as resistance
Consolidation at lows often precedes next leg down
Previous breakdown momentum not yet reversed

scenarios.reasoning: Significantly reduced volume suggests seller exhaustion. Could consolidate in tight range for several days while building energy for next move. Neither bulls nor bears in control yet.
supporting_factors: Price coiling between $400-412 for multiple days

scenarios.reasoning: If $400 holds firmly with volume, could see strong bounce targeting $410-420 resistance zone. Would represent failed breakdown and potential double bottom formation.
supporting_factors: Volume exhaustion suggests selling climax occurred

options_strategies.name: Iron Condor (Range Play)
options_strategies.rationale: Collect premium from both sides while price consolidates. Declining volume and tight range favors theta decay strategies.
options_strategies.profit_mechanism: Price stays between $395-412, collect full premium
options_strategies.risk: Breakout in either direction beyond $385 or $420
options_strategies.notes: Best if entered during slight rallies to $405-408 for better premium

entry_criteria.price_condition: Break and close below $400 with volume > 500K
entry_criteria.confirmation: No immediate reclaim of $400 on 15M chart

options_strategies.name: Bull Call Spread (Reversal Play)

entry_criteria.price_condition: Price holds $400 with bullish reversal candle AND breaks above $405

options_strategies.notes: Only enter if clear reversal confirmed - don't anticipate

primary_setup.name: Dual-Trigger Strategy
primary_setup.bearish_trigger: IF close below $400 with volume >500K, THEN enter bear put spread $400/$385
primary_setup.bullish_trigger: IF holds $400 AND breaks above $407 with volume, THEN enter bull call spread $402/$415
primary_setup.neutral_play: IF consolidates in $402-410 range, consider iron condor for premium collection

alternative_setup.name: Range Trading
alternative_setup.condition: If consolidation continues without clear break
alternative_setup.action: Enter iron condor $395 PUT/$412 CALL wings

avoid: Entering positions WITHOUT directional confirmation - this is inflection point
Overleveraging despite tighter consolidation - breakout could be violent
Assuming support will hold without confirmation
Chasing small intraday moves within consolidation range

key_takeaways.takeaway: TSLA consolidating at $400-412 after -12% breakdown, volume declining from 5.25M to 389K suggests exhaustion and coiling for next move
Breakdown continuation (45%) slightly favored over consolidation (30%) and bounce (25%), but all scenarios viable - await trigger
Dual-trigger approach: Bear puts if breaks <$400 OR bull calls if holds $400 and breaks >$407. Iron condor if range persists.
Position size: 15.0% of capital (reduced from 19.5% due to consolidation uncertainty). Tight stops at key levels.
$400 is THE decision level. Hold = potential bounce to $415. Break = continuation to $380-390 target zone.

verification_items: Risk parameters calculated before strategy selection
Market context reviewed - post-breakdown consolidation identified
quality_control.notes: Strong multi-timeframe analysis. Confidence slightly lower than pure directional plays due to inflection point uncertainty.

immediate_actions: Set price alerts at $400.00 (critical support), $407.00 (resistance break), $412.00 (major resistance)
Prepare BOTH bear put spread AND bull call spread orders for quick execution on triggers
Monitor volume closely - spike >500K indicates directional move incoming
Calculate exact position sizes (15% allocation) for each scenario
Have stops ready: $408 (bear plays) or $398 (bull plays)

market_open.focus: Watch for directional commitment. Gap and first 90 minutes often set daily tone. Volume key indicator.

mid_day.focus: Confirm morning direction holds OR watch for reversal. Tight range likely if no catalyst.

power_hour.focus: Closing price relative to $400 very important. Close below = bearish. Close above $405 = bullish.

decision_timeline.immediate: Next 4-12 hours - Decision likely at market open or during session
decision_timeline.short_term: 24-48 hours - Consolidation cannot persist much longer given coiling pattern
decision_timeline.contingency: If no clear direction after 48 hours, reassess with fresh timeframe analysis

moving_averages.interpretation: Price below all major MAs after breakdown. Need significant rally to reclaim. MAs will act as resistance on bounces.

volume_analysis.volume_interpretation: Dramatically reduced volume (84% below average) suggests seller exhaustion BUT also lack of buyer conviction. Low volume consolidations often precede explosive moves.
volume_analysis.volume_trend: Declining from extreme spike - neutral to slightly bullish signal

execution_notes.optimal_entry_timing: Wait for clear directional trigger rather than anticipating. Patience critical at inflection points.
execution_notes.position_management: Use defined-risk spreads given uncertainty. Prepare orders for BOTH directions in advance for quick execution.
execution_notes.hedge_considerations: Iron condor viable if consolidation persists. Otherwise, use spreads to limit tail risk.
execution_notes.slippage_concerns: Volume low but options still liquid. Use limit orders with reasonable fills.
execution_notes.iv_considerations: IV elevated but declining. Theta decay strategies (iron condor) have edge if range continues. Directional plays need movement soon to overcome decay.

final_assessment.overall_bias: NEUTRAL - AWAITING CONFIRMATION AT INFLECTION POINT
final_assessment.confidence_in_analysis: High (76.5%) - Clear consolidation pattern with well-defined triggers
final_assessment.action_urgency: High - Decision imminent within 24-48 hours based on coiling pattern
final_assessment.recommended_approach: Prepare dual-trigger strategy. Be ready to execute EITHER bearish or bullish play based on which trigger hits first. Do NOT anticipate - wait for confirmation.
final_assessment.critical_level_importance: EXTREME - This is THE decision level for next 10-20% move. Hold = potential reversal. Break = continuation to $380-390.
final_assessment.trader_mindset: Patience required at inflection points. The best trades come to those who wait for clear signals. Have orders ready for both scenarios. Let the market tell you which direction rather than guessing.

additional_considerations.pattern_completion: Consolidation after breakdown typically lasts 3-7 days. Currently day 4-5, suggesting resolution imminent.
additional_considerations.volume_characteristics: Declining volume during consolidation is classic coiling pattern. Breakout volume will be key confirmation.
additional_considerations.technical_damage: Breakdown was severe (-12%) but stabilization suggests some support interest. Not a free fall.
additional_considerations.psychological_factors: $400 is major psychological level. Round numbers matter in TSLA given retail participation.
